short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Play Cut The Rope Original version on your Google Chrome! Popup and Free!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_GB,es,e:
Cut the Rope, the beloved physics-based puzzle game, has now made its way to the Chrome Extension platform, allowing players to experience the delightful adventures of Om Nom right from their web browser. In this charming game, players are tasked with feeding candy to the adorable green creature, Om Nom, by cutting ropes and navigating through a series of challenging obstacles.

In Cut the Rope, each level presents players with a candy suspended by ropes, and their goal is to guide the candy into Om Nom's mouth. Players must strategically cut the ropes at the right time and in the right order to create a chain reaction that propels the candy towards its destination. The challenge lies in avoiding obstacles, utilizing physics, and collecting stars along the way to achieve a high score.

The game features intuitive touch or mouse controls, allowing players to easily swipe or click to cut the ropes and interact with the environment. With each level, new elements and mechanics are introduced, such as bubbles, spikes, and teleporters, adding complexity and variety to the gameplay.

Cut the Rope on Chrome Extension boasts colorful and vibrant visuals that bring the adorable characters and imaginative worlds to life. Each level is beautifully designed, featuring imaginative backgrounds and cleverly crafted puzzles that engage players throughout their journey. The cheerful music and sound effects further enhance the immersive experience.

With hundreds of levels and additional content packs available, Cut the Rope offers hours of fun and brain-teasing gameplay. Players can test their problem-solving skills and creativity as they strive to collect all the stars and unlock new levels. The game also features achievements and leaderboards, allowing players to compete with friends and players from around the world.

Whether you're a fan of puzzle games or simply looking for a delightful and challenging experience, Cut the Rope on Chrome Extension is a perfect choice. Join Om Nom on his sweet-filled adventure, solve intricate puzzles, and satisfy your craving for fun!
